alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 21 at 11:20AM MDT until May 25 at 1:13PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Lost River Valley and Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.7 Sun 11 am MD 4.0 4.1 3.9 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-222130- /O.NEW.KPIH.FL.A.0007.230523T0709Z-230525T1913Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1120 AM MDT Sun May 21 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES PREVIOUS FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From late Monday night to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
